#include<stdio.h>
#include<stdlib.h>
#include<string.h>

using namespace std;
typedef long long ll;
typedef ll LL;

ll getint(){ll i;scanf("%lld",&i);return i;}
ll xs,ys,xd,yd;

ll gcd1(ll a,ll b)
{
    if(a<b) return gcd1(b,a);

    if(b==0) return a;
    if(a==0) return b;

    if((a%b)==0) return b;

    return gcd1(b,a%b);
}

LL gcd(LL a, LL b)
{
	if(a==0) return b;
	if(b==0) return a;
	if(a%b==0) return b;
	return gcd(b,a%b);
}

ll min(ll a,ll b)
{
    if(a<b) return a;
    return b;
}

ll mod(ll a)
{
    if(a<0) return -a;
    return a;
}

int check(ll g1, ll g2)
{
	if(g1==g2) return 1;
	if(g1==0 || g2==0) return 0;
	if(g2%g1) return 0;

	ll c = g2/g1;
	ll p = 1;
	for(;1;)
		if(p==c) return 1;
		else if(p>c) return 0;
		else p<<=1;

	return 0;
}


int main()
{
    int cases;
    cases=getint();

    while(cases--)
    {
        xs=getint();
        ys=getint();
        xd=getint();
        yd=getint();


        long long a,b;
        a=gcd(mod(xs),mod(ys));
        b=gcd(mod(xd),mod(yd));


        if(check(a,b))
        {
            printf("YES\n");
        }
        else
        {
            printf("NO\n");
        }
    }
    return 0;
}
